rows.label: qst502015_msg0002
rows.name: There are small pests in this pond.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0003
rows.name:
I want to get rid of them to protect
the fish, but there are small fish
too, so I can't use pesticides...

rows.label: qst502015_msg0004
rows.name:
I thought if I could pass just the right
amount of lightning power through the
water, I could get them all at once...

rows.label: qst502015_msg0005
rows.name:
But it's not like someone who
can do that will just...

rows.label: qst502015_msg0006
rows.name: appear right in front of me.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0008
rows.name:
Don't you think you can do it?
Defeat just the small pests
without harming the fish?

rows.label: qst502015_msg0009
rows.name:
But I'm not used to
controlling my power...

rows.label: qst502015_msg0010
rows.name: I might end up shocking the fish too.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0011
rows.name: It'll be fine. Just give it a try.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0012
rows.name: Ugh... I'll give it a try!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0014
rows.name:
Now this pond is safe. The fish
can swim as they always do.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0017
rows.name: You really helped me out. Thank you.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0024
rows.name: W-whoa...! No, I can't do it!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0025
rows.name:
All I can see is a future
with fish floating belly-up!
